title: Add About Us page featuring creators

requirements.summary: Create a new About Us page at route '/about' that prominently features the creators: Shreya Salu and Bella Ann Kurian from Excelsior English School
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page is accessible at /about route
Page displays both creator names: Shreya Salu and Bella Ann Kurian
Page mentions their affiliation with Excelsior English School
Page follows the existing app's green-themed design system

file_operations.description: Create About Us page component that features creators Shreya Salu and Bella Ann Kurian from Excelsior English School. Include a hero section with the generated about-hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/about-hero.dim_1200x400.png. Display creator profiles with their names, school affiliation, and mission statement. Follow the existing green-themed design system with OKLCH colors and maintain consistency with other page layouts. Use Tailwind CSS classes matching the app's styling patterns.

Add new route definition for the About Us page at '/about' path using TanStack Router. Import the About component and register it in the router configuration alongside existing routes (home, register, stray dogs, shop, events, community). Ensure the route is wrapped in the Layout component consistent with other routes.

requirements.summary: Add an 'About Us' navigation link in the header that directs users to the new About Us page
acceptanceCriteria: About Us link appears in the main navigation header alongside existing links
Link is visible on both desktop and mobile views
Clicking the link navigates to /about page
Link styling matches existing navigation items

file_operations.description: Add 'About Us' navigation link to the header navigation menu. Include the link in both desktop navigation and mobile menu alongside existing links (Register, Stray Dogs, Shop, Events, Community). Use TanStack Router's Link component pointing to '/about'. Apply consistent styling with other navigation items including hover effects and active state styling. Ensure the link appears in the same responsive behavior as existing navigation links.
